1.7.10.0.12.3: * Fixed the '/extinguish' command causing an error when using the '/help' command the proper way...
1.7.10.0.12.2: * Fixed the '/extinguish' command causing an error when using the '/help' command.
1.7.10.0.12.1: * Fixed the '/extinguish' command causing an error on server consoles.
1.7.10.0.12.0:
* Fixed the '/nbtedit' UI closing when you used the 'accept' hotkey.
* Added a setting to disable Enderman and Enderman-like mobs from teleporting.
1.7.10.0.11.1: * Fixed key bindings being loaded on the server side, causing a crash.
1.7.10.0.11.0:
* Fall back to in-hand item if block has no tile entity when calling '/nbtedit'.
 * Support a shortcut key to delete the selected NBT tag inside the '/nbtedit' command'.
 * Add key bindings.
1.7.10.0.10.0: * Patch ServerUtilities' '/nbtedit' command to let you use 'numpad enter' to submit your changes.
1.7.10.0.9.0: * Patch ServerUtilities' '/nbtedit' command to edit the in-hand item (if present) if the in-world ray cast doesn't hit anything.
1.7.10.0.8.0: * Added the ability to bone meal Thaumcraft saplings.
1.7.10.0.7.0:
* Fixed changing configs while single player world is running not taking.
 * Big config overhaul, moved gameplay-related configs into their own sections.
 * Moved Tinker's Construct-related config items into a sub-section of gameplay config items.
 * Tinker's Construct Slime Sapling bone mealing can now be toggled on/off in the settings.
1.7.10.0.6.3: * Fixed repair command not applying to Tinker's and Gregtech tools.
1.7.10.0.6.2: * Fixed reload command not working properly on servers.
1.7.10.0.6.1: * Fixed a bad render distance access on servers in the extinguish command.
1.7.10.0.6.0: * Added a command to extinguish flames in an area.
1.7.10.0.5.3: * Adjusted admin output of repair command.
1.7.10.0.5.2: * Fixed an issue where the repair command was formatting the number of repaired items VERY wrong.
1.7.10.0.5.1: * Fixed an issue where the teleport command was parsing coordinates wrong.
1.7.10.0.5.0: * Added a command to repair items that can be repaired in various inventory types.
1.7.10.0.4.0: * Added a mixin to permit applying bone meal to Tinker's Construct slime saplings.
1.7.10.0.3.1: * Fixed Zombie Pigmen attacking when you mine ores in the Nether.
1.7.10.0.2.3: * Fixed mixins not applying correctly to Xaero's.
1.7.10.0.2.0: * Added ability to customize Xaero's teleport command.
1.7.10.0.1.2: * Fixed teleport command not respecting coordinates.
1.7.10.0.1.0:
* Updated several dependencies.
 * Added a cross-dimension teleport command.
 * Changed logo.
 * Ported existing code from old repository.
